Command.Name: Write IP Value
Command.Description: Command writes raw PWM counts, with no normalization

Command.Name: Write Control Output
Command.Description: Command writes control counts, which are translated to PWM counts via standard normalization algorithm and sent to PWM chip.

Variable.Name: Control Output
Variable.Description: Number of counts, to be translated to PWM counts via standard normalization algorithm before sending to PWM chip.

Variable.Name: ipValue_IPOut
Variable.Description: Raw PWM counts to drive I/P. 0 has a special meaning of returning to closed-loop control.
